Trump said he wanted to get America out of wars. He lied.

When we passed a bipartisan bill to end illegal support for Saudi airstrikes in Yemen, he vetoed it.

Trump ignored the Constitution to keep helping this brutal dictatorship as it bombs civilians. https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/saudi-led-coalition-airstrikes-kill-more-than-30-yemeni-civilians-says-un-as-fighting-intensifies/2020/02/16/b854c0b4-50b9-11ea-87b2-101dc5477dd7_story.html

California is on the front line of housing and caring for individuals who may be impacted by this. If you vote early, you MUST select three options on your ballot, or your vote will not be counted.

I congratulate the workers of Kickstarter, the first major tech company to vote for a union.
 
These workers are setting an example for the entire industry. Tech employees deserve job security, strong wages and benefits, and a voice in their companies. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/02/18/technology/kickstarter-union.html

My heart goes out to all of those affected by historic flooding in Mississippi. 

This is one more example of the devastating effects of the climate crisis. We must act now so that severe flooding and extreme storms don't become our new normal.
https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/mississippi-flooding-helpless-feeling-1-000-homes-feared-affected-n1137816

That's why I'm proudly endorsing candidates fighting to put power in the hands of the people. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERERjMyWkAA2Hyy.jpg

Every day we fail to address the disparities in maternal mortality for Black women, we are failing our families. Every day we don’t confront the persistent biases in our medical system, a mother could die. It’s urgent we pass my Maternal CARE Act in the Senate.

In under 3 years, the United States restructured the entire economy in order to win World War II and defeat fascism.

If we could do that, then we can certainly address the climate crisis.

With a Green New Deal we can create 20 million good jobs and transform our energy system. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1229943626316292097/img/lb5koELSZPpkgHa3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1229943626316292097/vid/480x270/1Ub88trXFY4JzcFN.mp4?tag=13

To me that means one person, one vote.

Mensaje importante para los votantes de Nevada: Si vota temprano DEBE seleccionar tres opciones en su boleta o su voto no será contado.

Today would have been Toni Morrison's 89th birthday. Thinking of the literary icon's powerful words, "If you find a book you really want to read but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it."
